ValidationRule.description:
Salesforce.com Change Request: NICC-007567
Org Type is required for Org Detail records with the "LOD Support Admin" and "Delphi.fdc Support Admin" Record Types
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(RecordType.Name = "Delphi.fdc Support Admin",RecordType.Name = "LOD Support Admin"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Org_Type__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select an Org Type for all Salesforce.com Org Detail records
